file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Student Information Management System
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
- url: https://localhost:8081/api
paths:
  /students:
    get:
      operationId: getStudents
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
              - id: 1
                code: "001"
                name: Khanh
              - id: 2
                code: "002"
                name: Quan
              schema:
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Student'
                type: array
          description: Get all students successfully
      summary: Get all students
      x-accepts: application/json
  /students/{id}:
    delete:
      operationId: deleteStudentById
      parameters:
      - description: Id of the Student
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                message: Student deleted!
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Response'
          description: Delete student information successfully
      summary: Delete a student by id
      x-accepts: application/json
    get:
      operationId: getStudentById
      parameters:
      - description: Id of the Student
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                id: 1
                code: "001"
                name: Khanh
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Student'
          description: Get student information successfully
      summary: Get a student by id
      x-accepts: application/json
components:
  schemas:
    Student:
      example:
        code: code
        name: name
        id: 0
      properties:
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        code:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
      type: object
    Response:
      example:
        message: message
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
      type: object
